channel.title: Java community: Learn/Make fun
channel.description:
Im looking to make a SKILLED java community! Too many newbs on the forum! Im here to make a team maybe community to make your guys dream come true! I will make a forum in a week or so If the community becomes big I will expand to user with: -SQL -PHP -Python - C / C+ -PHP
~ * ~ Juniors ~ * ~ Reqs: Be able to create GOOD methods without copying Be able to upload pictures in java Create return booleans
Members:
~ * ~ Java Spankers ~ * ~
Reqs: Playing music via java Creating frame Uploading cache Sending info via directory
Members: Java Geek
